overview: Claire, a young wife who is not satisfied with her older husband, meets a man at a bar and falls in love. The day her husband brings her subordinate home, she learns that her affair partner was her husband's subordinate and tries to stop her affair, but her subordinate Takasaki lets her go Claire don't give Takasaki says it's okay to have an affair with Claire who is dissatisfied. While the husband goes on a business trip for 1 night and 2 days, the relationship between the two deepens, but they face a crisis due to the sudden return of their husband...
title: Wife of righteousness manager
